title: Jinsei Ni Tsukareta Saikyou Majutsushi Wa Akiramete Nemuru Koto Ni Shita
alternative_title: Jinsei ni Tsukareta Saikyou Majutsushi wa Akiramete Nemuru Koto ni Shita ; Jinsei Ni Tsukareta Saikyou Majutsushi Wa Akiramete Nemuru Koto Ni Shita ; Tired of Life, the Strongest Magician Gave up and Fell Asleep ; 人生に疲れた最強魔術師は諦めて眠ることにした
status: Jinsei ni Tsukareta Saikyou Majutsushi wa Akiramete Nemuru Koto ni Shita ; Jinsei Ni Tsukareta Saikyou Majutsushi Wa Akiramete Nemuru Koto Ni Shita ; Tired of Life, the Strongest Magician Gave up and Fell Asleep ; 人生に疲れた最強魔術師は諦めて眠ることにした
description:
Description :
        Fiona, the most powerful magician in the empire, was tired of being overworked on the battlefield every day, both physically and emotionally. She thought she had given up her life on the battlefield, but when she woke up, she found herself under the protection of Matthias, the most powerful knight in the enemy kingdom!

In this powerful and loving fantasy, Fiona recovers her life while receiving love and tenderness for the first time!
